title: [机制]AutoCraft —— 全自动合成，释放你的双手！[1.14-1.15]
author: 小张up
txt_content:
本帖最后由 小张up 于 2020-4-30 19:12 编辑 
AutoCraft想要自动化一切吗？

简介/用处You want to automate everything?This plugin takes crafting of your shoulders.
Simply put an itemframe with a craftingtable in it on a dispenser. And put the recipe of the item you'd like to get craftet in the dispenser.This automatic craftingtable will now take every second(20 ticks) the needed items out of the inventory behind it and put the crafted item in the inventory infront of it.Works with shaped and shapeless recipes and with every block that has an inventory.
翻译你想自动合成所有物品吗？这个插件可以帮到你！只需在发射器上放置一个展示框，并把你需要合成的物品放入展示框即可。AutoCraft会以1秒/1个的速度为你自动合成物品可以合成所有物品(指原版物品)

使用方法
1.如图摆放所需方块(仔细看发射器，有方向的)




image.png (237.34 KB, 下载次数: 0)
